content.p: Assistant Professor of Organisational Management, Campus Senior Tutor, School Senior Tutor., Faculty of Social Sciences I have a combined background on sociology and management studies. Hence I can engage in relevant interdisciplinary research topics that either requires a socioeconomic, or organisational management input. I have taught in the past various modules under Organizational Behaviour and Human Resource Management subject group. Also I am teaching modules integrating sociology into management and economy such… read more I am currently engaged in research on Responsible Business Practices (specifically on sustainability) and Interdisciplinary research on Elephant Conservation in Peninsular Malaysia.
